text_block_list.text:
Uwaaaa, there's so much snow～…! 
Carrying a package in all of this, and hiking up a mountain～?!
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text:
(This trial is "To help find my strong point", 
according to Trainer-san. And McQueen-san is 
waiting at the summit for this generator)
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text: Alright, I'll carry this, and properly return the favor-!
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text:
Well then, Trainer-san, all we have to do now is wait. But that 
was surprising. That was quite the spirited request for this 
kind of eccentric training.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text:
To go so far to search for Kita-san's hidden abilities, 
seems like you're invested in this… But, traveling 
by foot is quite unreasonable.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text:
Carrying a heavy burden and ascending a snowy mountain. An 
ordinary Uma Musume would reach their limit at around the "Third 
Station". Then for Kita-san who hasn't even debuted-
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text:
Haa, haa… This… is really heavy… 
This might be harder than carrying a portable shrine…
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text:
But… I won't fail. 
I refuse to fail…!!
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text:
With Kita-san's current strength— 
She can probably reach the "Fifth Station", I would say.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text:
Yes, that girl doesn't have any outstanding 
abilities right now. But… I can sense something that 
can't really be put in to words.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text:
How should I put this, some kind of "Peculiarity". Which will 
take her to the Fourth Station. Her guts will carry her to the 
Fifth. That will be her limit. Which is still quite remarkable.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text:
Uuu… I can barely focus… Even though I've barely passed the 
half way point… Is this as… far as I go…?
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text:
Even though… Trainer-san went through all the trouble to 
prepare this for me. McQueen-san is waiting for me too. Is it 
fine… to give up here?
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text:
(No, it's not fine. Not returning the kindness given to them… 
Dad and his disciples, would rather die than let that happen.)
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text:
(Without even returning one favor. One more step 
forward. Until the very end, I need to carry on, 
otherwise I won't be me! That's why-)
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text:
Uoooooooooo, like hell I'll give uuuuup! Not until the very end, 
not until the very last momeeeeent!! Eyaaaaaa, C'mooooooon!
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text:
The sun is setting already… 
We should probably end it here.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text:
Most likely, she's probably unable to move just past the Fifth 
station. We should probably contact the observation staff, and 
have them carry her to a nearby rest stop…
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text: W-what's wrong, all of a sudden?
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
choice_data_list: I knew it… it's just like I thought
I knew it… it's just like I thought

text_block_list.text:
McQueen-san, sorry I'm late!! 
The generator… I've brought it!! Haa, haa, haa…!
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text:
K-Kita-san…! 
You made it here… all on your own?!
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text:
Yes! It was way tougher than I thought, and it took quite a long 
time. But if this repays the favor even a little…!
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text:
Trainer-san, thank you very much for the special training! And 
also… have you figured out what my strong points are with this?
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text:
Through this harsh trial, Kitasan Black's 
strong point has become clear.

Able to carry a heavy object up a snowy mountain with a "Strong 
Body", and quick recovery "Resilience". Never giving up, 
"Willpower". In other words-
Toughness-! That's my-!
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text:
Without a doubt. Completing something as reckless as this, 
there aren't any other Uma Musume with that level of toughness.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text:
I see～. But, is toughness something you can really 
use in a race? It doesn't really seem like it 
has any effect on speed, does it…?
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text:
Before a race? So something to do with preparations before a 
race… Ah! I see, you mean something like this?
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text:
By having Kita-san do some absurd training, 
you plan to make use of this ability? Just like Bourbon-san…?
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
choice_data_list: <size=41>That's right! We'll make use of that trait</size>
<size=41>That's right! We'll make use of that trait</size>

text_block_list.text:
Waaa! Yes, please do!! Please help me build up my strength! 
Build me up into something that will never lose to anyone!!
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text:
Trainer-san, McQueen-san, thank you very much! 
With this, I've got some hope!
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text:
From now on, I'll train and keep on training, and make use of 
this strength — I want to try it out. To see if I can become 
strong enough to reach the person I admire most.
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black

text_block_list.text:
I want to run together. 
With her- together with Tokai Teio-san!
text_block_list.name: Kitasan Black
